ConfigModel<T> - Class in ws.rocket.config
Configuration model holds the description of what structure a configuration file may have, how to parse it, and where to write the configuration settings/values (in a bean object).

Configuration model builder defines the language for describing a configuration file sections and their content parsing methods.

ws.rocket.config - package ws.rocket.config
The main classes that library users should know about Rocket-Config.
ws.rocket.config.bean - package ws.rocket.config.bean
Classes to simplify work on the target bean.
ws.rocket.config.reader - package ws.rocket.config.reader
Configuration file stream parsing line-by-line.
ws.rocket.config.section - package ws.rocket.config.section
Functionality for working with sections: reading, parsing, writing to beans.
ws.rocket.config.section.read - package ws.rocket.config.section.read
Contract and implementations for reading a configuration section.
ws.rocket.config.section.value - package ws.rocket.config.section.value
Contract and implementations for converting configuration data to runtime value types.
ws.rocket.config.section.write - package ws.rocket.config.section.write
Contract and implementations for writing a configuration section data to target bean.
